author: Brian Nicolich
comment: The face is perfect while active. But the ambient mode needs updating for non-LCD screens. For the OLED based screens, leave the color, and remove the unnecessary pixels (the neon wires), to save battery during ambient mode. So I guess there would have to be a watch/screen option to accomplish this. Add this option and it is perfect. But if you can live with these nitpicking, it is one of the best watch faces.
title: Excellent face...needs updating...

author: Jim Y
comment: Another great face ruined by black&white ambient mode. Why make a beautiful watch face and ruin it with an awful ambient mode. Give me the option to use ambient or not. You forced me to get a refund. Fix that and I'll repurchase and promote. also, l=no response from developer on this dim issue. if they're not even willing to address yes or no just avoid this face.

author: Russell Pollock
comment: Love the way it looks. Working well on my 360 Sport. Think I would like the ability to do a bit of customising, only reason it is not 5 stars.   Edit: Unfortunately this watch face causes massive disconnection with the phone. As soon as activated, starts disconnecting.

author: Lam Quang Thien
comment: Great watch face, just need an option for simpler DIM mode (without all the extra wires, lines and arrows, only keep the essential info) and it's perfect.

author: Burndawg 130i
comment: Love this. 5 stars if you implement an animation that resembles the flicker of neons switching on from ambient. That would be awesome!
title: Nice

author: Jeff Wilson
comment: Can not change from 12hr time to 24hr time
title: Not good

author: Ryan Mitchell
comment: looks great. would it be possible to get an option for small notification cards? the big ones cover too much of the watch face.
title: one of the best

author: Santone Glenn
comment: Looks awesome for about five minutes.. Reminds me of those Late Nite Doritos Cheeseburger bags.. Five stars if weather could be integrated..

author: Alexandre Guedes
comment: But could benefit from some customization options.
title: Slick looking and simple

author: Mikaail Haffejee
comment: Looks really good on the 360. I think custom colours would make it even better
title: Custom Colours?

comment: One of the best looking watch faces on the Moto 360. Very well designed. Hoping to add more customization features in the future.

author: Kabish
comment: Saw this face on reddit before I even had my 360. Was the first Face I Installed and I absolutely love it.
title: First Face I Installed

author: MrTcbfep
comment: Please remove the date. Does not go with this face

author: Hector Moreno
comment: It's fresh. Must have watch face for the Moto 360. Cheers!

author: Ryan Utara
comment: Would love some options for customizability.
title: Purchased, looks great

author: Luke Redfern
comment: Personally I preferred the simpler look
title: Option to remove date?

author: Braden Parker
comment: Different.  And it rocks.  Crystal clear.  Love it. Add weather and it will be the ultimate.
title: Great

author: Masi Sikandari
comment: Hope they add more colour customization.
title: Nice

author: Azrin Ahmad
comment: It looks stunning on my moto 360!!!
title: I love it!

author: Mitch Cairns
comment: Awesome watchface. The developer communication is great as well! I highly recommend these watchfaces!
title: Yes!

comment: Love the app wish you could add the date somewhere and possibly change the color scheme.

author: Delta Matt
comment: I would like to see a settings list added so that I'm able to change the 12/24 hour manually, brightness, etc.
title: Needs more updates

author: Marc Wenning
comment: Not bad would like some options for things like 12/24 hour, maybe a date somewhere on the screen but overall is pretty cool.
Adds some nice funky colours and design. Love it. Well done dev.
title: Funky awesomeness

author: Bo Stone
comment: Creativity at its best!

author: Clarence Willey
comment: Watch face didn't show in my android app and I also have other rabbit watch faces so I am not sure what happened with this one.
title: Refunded
